channel.title: CVE Feed for MantraBrain -- Yatra

item.title: CVE-2022-47436|2024-08-03T14:55:07.960Z -- mantrabrain -- yatra
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in MantraBrain Yatra allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Yatra: from n/a through 2.1.14.
